alert.note: Alert for Fairfield; Franklin; Licking; Pickaway (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 12 at 5:46PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A SHOWER WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF SOUTHEASTERN FRANKLIN, NORTHWESTERN FAIRFIELD, NORTHEASTERN PICKAWAY AND LICKING COUNTIES THROUGH 615 PM EDT... At 546 PM EDT, a shower was located over Canal Winchester, moving northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Columbus, Newark, Lancaster, Reynoldsburg, Gahanna, Pickerington, Heath, Granville, Pataskala, Canal Winchester, Groveport, Johnstown, Baltimore, Buckeye Lake, Hebron, Millersport, Pleasantville, Hanover, Harbor Hills and Granville South. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a sturdy building. To report hazardous weather conditions, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.
